name: Karts With Chat
description:
Stupid++ presents Karts With Chat: A Twitch.tv multiplayer racing game for streamers!

 Features

  • Four unique and chaotic race tracks
  • Super fun viewer-streamer interaction
  • Customizable texture mods
 Texture Modding

Karts With Chat allows you to customize the look of your game super easily using texture mods. Here's an example of the game with a monochrome-looking texture mod:

Read more about texture modding here.

 Controls

  • WASD To move
  • Click and drag to look around
  • Enter to Start/Stop the race
  • ESC for settings
 Notes

  • At the end of a race the full leaderboard is copied to your clipboard.
  • If you have any questions or something breaks feel free to leave a comment in Bug Reports And Support.
  • Special thanks to Kenney and XQC.
